attributes.action: To ask all 114 MPs who either voted or abstained against Brexit to resign.
attributes.background: We the people demand that all MPs who voted or abstained against Brexit to immediately resign their position as an MP.  They, by their action have gone against the will of the people and are now not trusted to perform their duty as an MP as such they must GO

rejection.details: The Government and Parliament aren't responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views and opinions.
